project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on input provided.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functions for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion functions for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functions for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functions for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functions for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functions for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
